body:
Java Language

Java is the most popular programming language currently in use. It is designed to run on all platform that support Java without recompilation. Java is mostly used for client â€“ server web applications. It is developed by James Gosling and released in 1995 as a core component of Java platform. Language originates much of its composition from C and C++, but it has fewer low-level facilities than either of them.

James Gosling

James Arthur Gosling is born in Canada at May 19, 1955. He is known as creator of the Java language.

From 1984 to 2010, he worked at Sun Microsystems where he developed Java language.

Honors

1. 2002: The Economist Innovation Award
2. 2002: The Flame Award USENIX Lifetime Achievement Award

3. 2007: He was made an Officer of the Order of Canada

4. 2013: He became a partner of the Association for Computing Machinery

5. 2015: IEEE John von Neumann Medal

References

http://spectrum.ieee.org/computing/software/the-2015-top-ten-programming-languages
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Gosling
